job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under traditional software development and integration tasks aimed at enhancing an existing system.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions directly relates to the process of adapting or improving machine learning models, fitting the definition of Model Development & Fine-Tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies aligns with the research and experimentation aspect of Model Development & Fine-Tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This task involves integrating AI capabilities with human expertise to deliver a service, which is a form of software integration to enhance functionality.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: The mention of a rapid ramp-up period on multiple products highlights the need for quick learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on being 'adept at unblocking yourself' points to strong problem-solving and self-sufficiency, aligning with Problem Solving & Pragmatism.

profile.rationale: The job description primarily focuses on integrating AI capabilities into existing customer resolution systems and improving AI models through feedback and fine-tuning. While there are elements of AI model fine-tuning (1.B.1), the core responsibility is to improve the AI system and integrate AI capabilities to deliver customer support, which aligns with Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration). The role is about supporting and enhancing an AI-augmented system rather than developing novel AI models from scratch or specializing solely in GenAI tasks. Therefore, 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' is the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines tasks related to improving AI systems and integrating AI capabilities into customer support. While the tasks lean towards AI integration and improvement, the specific mention of 'AI model fine-tuning sessions' could suggest a slightly deeper involvement in AI specialization. However, the overall context points more towards supporting and enhancing an existing AI-augmented system. The confidence is high, but not perfect, due to the slight ambiguity between enhancing AI systems (AI-Adjacent) and direct model work (Specialist/Engineer).
